Blacksmith Feynn:
I, the great Feynn, am talented at augmenting items as well. Are you requesting something be augmented right now?
Did you hear that Life Stones can no longer be found? The good thing is that a more powerful stone has been found. It's called the Spirit Stone.
Don't worry. You can keep augmenting if you have Life Stones left. I can also exchange those Life Stones for Spirit Stones.
